org.apache.ignite.ml.regressions.logistic

Class LogisticRegressionSGDTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.DatasetTrainer<M,Double>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.SingleLabelDatasetTrainer<LogisticRegressionModel>
        • org.apache.ignite.ml.regressions.logistic.LogisticRegressionSGDTrainer

  • public class LogisticRegressionSGDTrainer
extends SingleLabelDatasetTrainer<LogisticRegressionModel>
    Trainer of the logistic regression model based on stochastic gradient descent algorithm.
